snippet: RIBAKOVE--Evelyn Shirley, 94, on Sunday, April 10, 2016, formerly of Brooklyn, NY. Predeceased by her husband Lionel Arthur Ribakove. Surviving are her children Richard Ribakove (Andrea), and Bruce Ribakove (Vera), and four grandchildren Jeremy, Stephanie, Robyn, and A.J. Services were under the direction of Bernheim Apter Kreitzman, Livingston, NJ. 1/3
lead_paragraph: RIBAKOVE--Evelyn Shirley, 94, on Sunday, April 10, 2016, formerly of Brooklyn, NY. Predeceased by her husband Lionel Arthur Ribakove. headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  RIBAKOVE, EVELYN SHIRLEY
